## Nutrient cycles: Ecosystem
<hr>

<div style="float: left; width: 40%;">

* **Entry of nutrients into system <span style="color:blue">(IN)</span>**
    + fixation (bacteria)
    + weathering (rocks)
    + deposition (acid rain)

<br />

* **Internal transfer <span style="color:blue">(recycling)</span>**
    + food webs
    + decomposition
    + inorganic - organic
 
 <br />
 
* **Loss of nutrients from system <span style="color:blue">(OUT)</span>**
    + gas loss, leaching, disturbance
    
 <br />
 
* **Steady State and Succession....**

</div>

<IMG STYLE="position:absolute; TOP:175px; LEFT:450px; WIDTH:550px; HEIGHT:500px" SRC="images/nutrient_cycle1.png">
